posts.name: Swati Jain
posts.cooked:
Good Evening @carlton

I am writing here to request for your assistance regarding incorrect evaluation.

Week 5 GA

  • Q5, Q6 & Q8 - The options I chose are correct but I haven’t been given marks for it. - What mistakes did I make in these questions of GA5? - #11 (Sir gave me the confirmation that my answers were correct)
    image757×807 33.6 KB

    GA 5 - Calculating similarity of words - #10
  • Q1 & Q2 - Here the point difference I am getting is one which is due to the last statement which says in Q1 as “before” but actually it is “after” only word difference and Q2 says “after” whereas it is “before” which makes the statements wrong.
    image810×795 44 KB

GA5 Q1 & Q2 answers might be wrong - #23

GA 4 marks reduction

Initially my marks for 100 for GA 4 later it was changed to 91 I feel this is due to incorrect evaluation in Q11 which asks for discourse link. If there is any other question I got wrong please let me know.

I have raised this issue to support too (Ticket #79697). The intension for this post is to get speedy resolution.

Thanks & Regards,
Swati Jain

link_counts.title: GA5 Q1 & Q2 answers might be wrong
What mistakes did I make in these questions of GA5?

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Swati,

I have made a note of it and will forward your concern to the instructors. @dibujohn @s.anand @jkmadathil

Kind regards

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked:
Hello @carlton. Some of these issues are impacting all students. Please let me know if all of us should be raising support tickets to get these resolved?

I’m facing the same problem as above in GA3, GA4, and GA5, where my marks have been either been reduced or have not been counted.

I didn’t raise any ticket earlier, thinking that since this is a mass problem, it will get resolved for everyone at the same time.

@jkmadathil kindy advise.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Hi Anupam,

These are largely operational issues as far as I can tell. I do not know the proper scale of the problem because I do not have visibility of the backend systems. So far @jkmadathil is the primary contact point with regards to these issues as he is the head of operations and the portal’s chief technical architect. I can reassure you that the problems do not affect everyone, but rather a smaller subset, because I have vetted these issues with individual students who are also taking TDS this term and have not encountered these issues. As to why, I do not know. On my end, if there are any notices on discourse, I make a note of the ids and post numbers and bring them up in our internal communications. If these are primarily disputed marks (aka its a course instructor discretion issue) then these are more appropriately dealt with by Dibu, Prasanna and S Anand.

Hope that gives some clarity. Operational issues are also best dealt with sending tickets. This gives the portal team a formal catalogue of the scale vs the hodgepodge of discourse posts (which sometimes unintentionally might be missed depending on the volume of posts).

posts.name: Swati Jain
posts.cooked: Thanks a lot for forwarding my issues.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked: Could you share the exact questions where you found discrepancies. It will help us track down the exact problem.

posts.name: Anupam Chandra
posts.cooked:
I do not know the problem in GA4 as the answers have not been provided. However, my score went from 100 to 91. This is in spite of the bonus question (Question 11) being correct.

In GA 5, Question 8 is correct (as confirmed by the Professor on Discourse), but marked incorrectly.

In GA3, Q3 for me is showing incorrect now. It was incorrect a few weeks ago too, but then the score moved up to 100 and then back to 90.

posts.cooked:
Marks Discrepancy Tools in Data Science
Dear Students, After the submission of Week 6 assignment, we will be sending out a Gform to all students to fill, in order to let us know if there are any discrepancies in your marks. You will have to give the specific Q Nos and the nature of the discrepancy in the form. You will only be allowed one submission. So please read the form carefully and fill it exactly as instructed. We will resolve any outstanding issues that you may have faced. Thanks for your feedback, understanding, and pati…
